title:
Topological structure of projective Hilbert spaces associated with phase
  retrieval vectors
authors: Fahimeh Arabyani Neyshaburi, Ali Akbar Arefijamaal, Ghadir Sadeghi
abstract:
In this paper, we explore the interplay between topological structures and
phase retrieval in the context of projective Hilbert spaces. This work provides
not only a deeper understanding and a new classification of the phase retrieval
property in Hilbert spaces but also a way for further investigations into the
topological underpinnings of quantum states.
